statements: DELETE FROM robotic_farm_equipment_schedule WHERE task_status = 'Failed' AND equipment_name = 'Harvester';
DELETE FROM schedule WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND task_id = 5 AND start_time = '2022-01-01 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (SELECT task_id FROM schedule WHERE estimated_duration > 60);
DELETE FROM Robot WHERE type = 'Agricultural' AND location = 'Field';
DELETE FROM tasks WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND duration > 30;
